key_facts: Paper production contributes to deforestation and emissions.
Paper often contains plastic linings that hinder recycling.
Plastic is derived from fossil fuels and produces high emissions.
Most plastic is rarely recycled and often exported to the Global South.
Bioplastics may contain harmful chemicals and raise land use concerns.
Bioplastics can impact food security due to crop demand.
Experts say recycling alone is not a sufficient solution.
Reusable packaging is a more sustainable alternative.
Reducing overall consumption is essential for sustainability.
The culture of single-use products drives environmental harm.
